_sText:
Island - Hostage Rescue

The original to_Eskero was made by Cormac "Poneil" Donnelly for TacticalOps.
The layout allows an extremely pleasant and balanced gameplay.
This new version carries the old one into Counter-Strike : Source with many fresh features, as a new way to take hostages and save them.
The whole map has been redisgned to benefit by the power of Source engine :
Ambient sounds, Breakable lights...

The story :
Events take place on a little island with a lighthouse during a thunder storm.
The lighthouse keepers were kidnaped by terrorists in order to be in control of the area around the island.
Thus the governement decided to send elite troups to release hostages and suppress the threat.

Other Notes : There are 3 hostages in
this mission.

Credits :

Map/Textures :
Gabriel Thibaud (glloq69 at free.fr) Web Site : http://glloq69.free.fr/mapping
Original map : to_eskero by Cormac "Poneil" Donnelly

This released is the FINAL version I would not release an other one but for there is a big issue. 

IMPORTANT : The .nav is included in the .bsp file, don't generate your own .nav file, it will not work due to the hostages' position.

Finally I hope youwill enjoy it!
